        public Erdos()

    • Method Detail

      • getGraph

        public edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<Vertex,Edge> getGraph(double probability,
                                                          int n)
        Generates an undirected Erdos-Renyi random graph based on the given probability and the maximum number of nodes n. Nodes are general Vertex objects with ID's equal to the vertices number when created ("1", "2", ... etc). Creates new core.Vertex objects and core.Edges between vertices
        Parameters:
        probability - The probability of two vertices having an edge
        n - The number of vertices in the graph
        Returns:
        A Erdos-Renyi random graph based on the given parameters.

      • getGraph

        public edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<V,Edge> getGraph(java.util.Collection<V> vertexSet,
                                                     double probability)
        Generate an undirected Erdo-Renyi random graph based on the given probability and the vertex set provided. All nodes in the set are added to the graph before random edges are added. Uses the core.Edges to connect the V vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertexSet - The set of vertices to make the graph from
        probability - The probability of an edge existing [0,1]
        Returns:
        A Erdos-Renyi random graph based on the given parameters.

      • getGraph

        public edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<Vertex,Edge> getGraph(double probability,
                                                          int n,
                                                          boolean isDirected)
        Generates an Erdos-Renyi random graph based on the given probability and the maximum number of nodes n. Nodes are general Vertex objects with ID's equal to the vertices number when created ("1", "2", ... etc). Creates new core.Vertex objects and core.Edges between vertices
        Parameters:
        probability - The probability of two vertices having an edge
        n - The number of vertices in the graph
        isDirected - Indicates whether or not the graph has directed edges
        Returns:
        A Erdos-Renyi random graph based on the given parameters.

      • getGraph

        public edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<V,Edge> getGraph(java.util.Collection<V> vertexSet,
                                                     double probability,
                                                     boolean isDirected)
        Generate an Erdo-Renyi random graph based on the given probability and the vertex set provided. All nodes in the set are added to the graph before random edges are added. Uses the core.Edges to connect the V vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertexSet - The set of vertices to make the graph from
        probability - The probability of an edge existing [0,1]
        isDirected - Indicates whether or not the graph has directed edges
        Returns:
        A Erdos-Renyi random graph based on the given parameters.
